description: This source file implements the worker functions for the Http Simple Server Object, including accept, set output, remove, query, process sync/async, send complete, and notify handlers. It manages client connections, session objects, buffer descriptors, and socket events within an HTTP server environment.

methods.name: BOOL HttpSsoDstowoAccept(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PANSC_HANDLE phClientContext)
methods.description: Handles incoming client connection requests, creates or retrieves web session objects, accepts the connection, and initializes buffer descriptors.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpSsoDstowoSetOut(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket)
methods.description: Placeholder for setting output on a socket; currently a no-op.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpSsoDstowoRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket)
methods.description: Removes a client connection, cleans up session and buffer objects, and releases associated resources.

methods.name: ULONG HttpSsoDstowoQuery(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,PANSC_HANDLE phQueryContext)
methods.description: Processes incoming data buffer, determines processing mode (collect, process, finish), and manages session access.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpSsoDstowoProcessSync(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hQueryContext)
methods.description: Processes received data synchronously, invokes session recv, handles session state, and closes socket if finished.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpSsoDstowoProcessAsync(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hQueryContext)
methods.description: Currently unimplemented; intended for asynchronous processing of incoming data.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpSsoDstowoSendComplete(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved,ANSC_STATUS status)
methods.description: Handles completion of data send operations, currently a no-op.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpSsoDstowoNotify(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,ULONG ulEvent,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Handles socket events such as errors, closure, resource availability, timeout, and performs cleanup.
